CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 18, 1957, pg. 15 reads: Honor Three Mothers - The Los Jevenes Missionary Club of Trinity AME Church, honored three outstanding mothers, in community during a special service at the church on Mother's Day. Left to right: Miss Mary Stevens, Mrs. E. Blanks, Mrs. M. Sowell, Arnie Sowell, Mrs. M. Whedbee, Mrs. C. Eckstein, and Mrs. A. Sawyer.  Back row: Miss Jean Brown and Jodie Harris. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait from left: Mary Stevens, Mrs. E. Blanks, Mrs. M. Sowell, Arnie Sowell, Maxine Eckstein Whedbee, Mrs. C. Eckstein, and Aileen Eckstein Sawyer; back row: Jean Brown and Jodie Harris, posed behind table in Trinity AME Church for Mother's Day
